figure_2: Forest plot of random-effects meta-analysis comparing the odds of S. aureus infection among colonized and uncolonized individuals. ES = effect size. The gray shaded boxes vary in size according to the weight given to each study
figure_3: Forest plot of random-effects meta-analysis comparing the odds of methicillin-resistant S. aureus infection among colonized and non-colonized individuals. ES = effect size. The gray shaded boxes vary in size according to the weight of each study
figure_4: Forest plot of random-effects meta-analysis comparing the odds of methicillin-susceptible S. aureus infection among colonized and non-colonized individuals. ES = effect size. The gray shaded boxes vary in size according to the weight of each study
